apis.name: List project variables
apis.description: Get list of a project’s variables.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID of a project or URL-encoded NAMESPACE/PROJECT_NAME of the project owned by the authenticated user

apis.name: Get a single variable
apis.description: Get the details of a single variable. If there are multiple variables with the same key, use filter to select the correct environment_scope.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID of a project or URL-encoded NAMESPACE/PROJECT_NAME of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: key
attributes.description: The key of a variable

attributes.name: filter
attributes.description: Available filters: [environment_scope]. See the filter parameter details.

apis.name: Create a variable
apis.description: Create a new variable. If a variable with the same key already exists, the new variable must have a different environment_scope. Otherwise, GitLab returns a message similar to: VARIABLE_NAME has already been taken.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID of a project or URL-encoded NAMESPACE/PROJECT_NAME of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: key
attributes.description: The key of a variable; must have no more than 255 characters; only A-Z, a-z, 0-9, and _ are allowed

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value of a variable

attributes.name: variable_type
attributes.description: The type of a variable. Available types are: env_var (default) and file

attributes.name: protected
attributes.description: Whether the variable is protected. Default: false

attributes.name: masked
attributes.description: Whether the variable is masked. Default: false

attributes.name: environment_scope
attributes.description: The environment_scope of the variable. Default: *

apis.name: Update a variable
apis.description: Update a project’s variable. If there are multiple variables with the same key, use filter to select the correct environment_scope.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID of a project or URL-encoded NAMESPACE/PROJECT_NAME of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: key
attributes.description: The key of a variable

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value of a variable

attributes.name: variable_type
attributes.description: The type of a variable. Available types are: env_var (default) and file

attributes.name: protected
attributes.description: Whether the variable is protected

attributes.name: masked
attributes.description: Whether the variable is masked

attributes.name: environment_scope
attributes.description: The environment_scope of the variable

attributes.name: filter
attributes.description: Available filters: [environment_scope]. See the filter parameter details.

apis.name: Delete a variable
apis.description: Delete a project’s variable. If there are multiple variables with the same key, use filter to select the correct environment_scope.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID of a project or URL-encoded NAMESPACE/PROJECT_NAME of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: key
attributes.description: The key of a variable

attributes.name: filter
attributes.description: Available filters: [environment_scope]. See the filter parameter details.
